(static) getChanges(client, paramsopt) → {Promise}

Get changes logs
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
client Client Client which will be used to perform the request
params Object <optional>
 last, "limit" and "since" arguments
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
last Boolean <optional>
 false Specify whether or not only the last change should be returned
since Integer <optional>
 0 Set the sequence number since which changes should be returned
limit Integer <optional>
 100 Set the returned changes limit. Default and maximum values are the same : 100

  • lib/changes.js, line 17
Returns:
The expected response is a JSON object
